duties_responsibilities.duty: Serves as the primary point of contact for Cardiology appointment scheduling with new and existing patients.
Relay patient concerns, medication refill requests, create and send messages to clinical staff, provider or office staff per protocol accurately and timely.
Assist patients by giving directions or fax number to a practice or by following up on a referral.
Deliver high quality customer service to the patients, community, businesses, and practices served.
Listen to complex situations to prioritize the needs of the caller and research the caller's request to ensure accuracy and best patient care.

Remain calm in stressful situations and be thorough when entering patient demographics, verifying insurance information, reviewing HIPAA information, scheduling an appointment, or when sending a message.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED with preferred completion of courses in medical terminology and basic anatomy.
